snippet.title: The Lords of the Fallen Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2022
snippet.description:
We get our first look at gameplay for The Lords of the Fallen, a new dark-fantasy action-RPG. The trailer is narrated by Milly Alcock, rising star of HBO fantasy series, House of the Dragon, and the trailer was captured fully in-game. 

Taking place over a thousand years after the events of the first game, The Lords of the Fallen will take players on an all-new epic adventure through a vast and sprawling world, split at its very core between the realm of the living and the dead. An expansive RPG experience, players will need to traverse between the two fully interconnected worlds, each offering its own unique pathways, side quests, NPCs, enemies and treasures.

Lords of the Fallen is being made in Unreal Engine 5 andwill launch for PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S next year.

#lordsofthefallen #thegameawards #gaming
